TI RETRACTED: Ecotoxicological risk of Residual Solvents in Pharmaceuticals
   on Daphnia Magna (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Residual Solvent; Ecotoxicity; Pharmaceuticals
ID TOXICITY; MIXTURES; COPPER
AB Ecotoxicity of residual solvents of pharmaceuticals on daphnia magna was studied by acute test. The results showed the order of toxicity of residual solvents of terramycin, thiamine hydrochloride and thiamine mononitrate was benzene > carbon tetrachloride > 1, 2-dichloroethane > 1, 1-dichloroethylene > 1, 1, 1-trichloroethane, dichloromethane > tetrahydrofuran > toluene > methanol> ethyl acetate = acetic acid = ethanol, N-methylpyrrolidon > N, N-dimethylacetamide > methanol > aether, respectively. The ecotoxicity of methanol in combined system was more severe than that of in single system. The LC50s of methanol were 72.21, 91.94 and 3.357x10(4) mg/L in thiamine hydrochloride, thiamine mononitrate and in single system, respectively. It was likely that the toxic effect of residual solvents increased in the presence of potential competitors. The study provided baseline information which was necessary to assess the potential hazard of some residual solvents released into water ecosystems. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Eco-Sensitivity Analysis of the New Riverside Center of
   Nanjing City Based on GIS (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Eco-sensitivity; Spatial Analysis; GIS; New Riverside Center; Nanjing
   City
AB Eco-sensitivity analysis is the premise and basis for the planning of regional ecological environment, while the protection and improvement of the ecological environment is the key to the regionally sustainable development. With the GIS technology and by using the factor-overlap method, the eco-sensitivity of the New Riverside Center of Nanjing City is thoroughly analyzed in this paper by selecting 4 categories of regionally representative factors. Then this paper classifies the study area into absolutely sensitive ecological sub-areas, high sensitive ecological sub-areas, generally sensitive ecological sub-areas and low sensitive ecological sub-areas according to the level of eco-sensitivity. It further proposes measures and suggestions to regional protection and construction, so as to provide reference for the development of local urban and rural construction and environmental protection. The results show that absolutely sensitive sub-areas and high sensitive sub-areas account for about 42.8% in the total area, indicating that the eco-sensitivity of the study area is generally high. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Research on Application of Duration-Cost Optimization in Port
   Machinery Manufacturing Project (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Port machinery manufacturing project; optimization; the 'closed loop'
   principle; genetic algorithm
AB Duo to the complexity of port machinery manufacturing project, its duration-cost optimization is very important. The necessity of duration-cost optimization in port machinery manufacturing projects is analyzed in the paper, and the rational way to estimate the duration of the project is introduced. The appropriate model of duration-cost optimization is established based on the 'closed loop' principle. According to the characteristics of the model, the solution to the simulation example is designed based on Genetic Algorithm. The simulation results show the feasibility and effectiveness of the model. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Global Finite-time Stabilization of a Chain of Integrators
   and Its Application (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Global finite-time stabilization; homogeneous system; integrators;
   multi-scroll saturated chaotic system
ID STABILITY; SYSTEMS
AB This paper investigates the problem of global finite-time stabilization of a chain of integrators. Based on finite-time stability theory of homogeneous system, a criterion is proposed for the global finite-time stabilization of the integrators by a single-state feedback control law. The result is then applied to locally finite-time stabilize a multi-scroll saturated chaotic system via homogeneous approximation. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: Behavior Prediction and Control Approach in Tunnel
   Underground Ventilation Equipment Room (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE underground ventilation equipment room; fire disaster; personnel
   evacuation; behavior prediction
AB At present, there is no specification on the disaster prevention of and relief from a semi-airtight underground ventilation equipment room. Based on the study of construction fire prevention at home and abroad, this paper carries on the analysis of personnel evacuation from an underground ventilation equipment room. It firstly conducts researches on the basic maxims, framework and procedure of disaster prevention, then sets the evaluation standards of safe evacuation and presents the major influential factors as well. Finally, this paper sets an evacuation model in the hope to reach the goal of safe disperse without any injury, i.e. RSET(x)<ASET(x). (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: The Characters of Biorthogonal Two-directional Finitely
   Supported Wavelet Wraps with Three-scaled Filter Banks (Retracted
   Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE two-directional; biorthogonal; dual pairs; finite support; wavelet
   wraps; oversampling; pyramid decomposition scheme
AB This research proposes a novel method constructing two-directional biorthogonal wavelet wraps. The notion of biorthogonal two-directional finitely supported bivariate wavelet wraps with three-scale is introduced. Their properties is investigated by means of time-frequency analysis method, matrix theory, iteration method and operator theory. The decomposition relationship is established. In the final, two Reesz bases of bivariate function space are drawn from these wavelet wraps. The pyramid decomposition scheme is obtained based on such a BGMS and a sufficient condition for its existence is provided. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

   (Retracted Article)

   2011

DE Resources integration; system model; SOA; ESB; Web Services;
   heterogeneous systems
AB As a large number of tourism information resources are disorderly and closed in their independent systems, the need for integrating these heterogeneous systems is prominent in tourism e-commerce. As an architectural style with intact encapsulation and high integration, SOA is one of the most appropriate solution to addressing heterogeneous systems integration and application integration at current. The framework of tourism information integration system based on SOA is presented, which could perform the cross-enterprise and cross-agency integrated tourism information services in different enterprises and institutions, so establish a large-scale tourism e-commerce system. TI RETRACTED: Effect of Natural Gas Composition Variation on Engine
   Emission and Its Interchangeability Measures (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE naturel gas engine; LNG; interchangeability; methane number; antiknock;
   closed-loop feedback control; air-fuel ratio; spark advance angle
AB The multi sources gas supply situation will exist for a long time in China's city gas supply. The natural gas engine interchangeability problem and its possible impact on engine operation were analyzed, the index and the method of determining interchangeability for gas engine were introduced, three response measures for natural gas interchangeability in the terms of the domestic and international standards, engine manufacturers and end users were given in this paper: the relevant industry standards should be detailed, to increase the requirement of methane number (MN) range, the interchangeability between different gas source and the possible impact of end user should put into evaluation at the beginning of gas procurement; the natural gas component should be strictly defined in the engine design and manufacturing phase of engine manufacturers, and ensure that the engine and control system design meets changes of the gas composition; mixing inert gas such as N-2 and CO2 in the end user side to increase the gas MN, thereby increasing its antiknock tendency, furthermore, the measures such as the installation of closed-loop control engine with oxygen sensor in the exhaust and adjust air-fuel ratio accurately and adjusting engine ignition timing, to adapt the changes in gas composition to ensure that the engine working conditions are not significantly affected, to meet the requirements of natural gas interchangeability (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Layered MIML Structure Used in Complicated System (Retracted
   Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Multi-instance learning; Multi-label learning; Multi-instance
   Multi-label learning
AB In this paper, we analyzed the multi-instance multi-label (MIML) learning structure which proposed by Zhou. In real-world, there are many problems mentioned in complicated systems, traditional MIML structure would only consider the initial and final state, when facing with more tanglesome system, the lack of middle decision layer will affect the whole capability of system. The new proposed structure - layered MIML frame will help us to solve these tasks more easily by middle layer with reward mechanism. Finally, we use RoboCup Simulation 2D as platform to verify our frame and algorithms, the result shows the frame presented is valid and well-performed. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: Design and Implementation of High Reliable SpaceWire Image
   Data Transmission Equipment for Space Application (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE SpaceWire; FPGA; Asynchronous clock domains; Link error recovery
AB This paper introduces a design and implementation of high speed image data transmission equipment, which adopts SpaceWire protocol. The equipment's SpaceWire interface is realized with FPGA and SpaceWire ASIC, This paper elaborates the asynchronous clock domains control signal and the data signal processing method from the point of reliability design. Even if it doesn't use the SpaceWire transport layer protocol, the equipment also has the reliable erroneous data re-sending ability for the burst error of the link. The test result indicated that this equipment can transmit the image data at 140Mbps and reliably. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: The laccase conditons of efficient hydroxybenzene-degrading
   bacteria in Coal Chemical Industry Wastewater (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE coal chemical industry wastewater; hydroxybenzene; laccase; Klebsiella
   pneumoniae strain AU45
ID OXIDASE; FUNGUS
AB The phenol ratio of separation culture medium was based on the components of original wastewater. One efficient hydroxybenzene-degrading bacteria Klebsiella pneumoniae strain AU45 was seperated from coal chemical industry wastewater. The growth and laccase activity of Klebsiella pneumoniae strain AU45 were measured in different conditions. The optimum growing conditions: hydroxybenzene 600-1000mg/L, temperature 30-40 degrees C, PH 6.5-8; the optimum production conditions of laccase: hydroxybenzene 1000mg/L, temperature 35-40 degrees C, PH 7-7.5. The changes of laccase in 24h was measured in the optimum production conditions of laccase. The growth and laccase activity were both resisted in the first 0-8h, and increased after 8-12h recovering. The results show that this strain have strong recovering ability, growing rate, degradation rate and laccse acticvity. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Study on Post-treatment of Coal Gasification Wastewater by
   Coagulation (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE coke gasification wastewater; coagulation process; further treatment;
   PAC; CPAM; decoloration reagent
ID NITRIFICATION; REMOVAL; PLANT
AB The effluent from the aerobic treatment of a gasification factory was treated by coagulation process. PAC was used as coagulant, CPAM and decoloration reagent were used as coagulant aid to investigate the optimal dosage of coagulant and coagulant aid. The results indicated that the optimize dosage of PAC was 140mg/L, COD removal rate was 29.1% and the decoloration rate was 60%. The optimal dosage of CPAM was 2mg/L when the PAC dosage was 140mg/L, COD removal rate was 35.7% and decoloration rate was 67.1%. The optimal dosage of decoloration reagent was 4 mg/L when the PAC dosage was 140mg/L, COD removal rate was 42.1% and decoloration rate was 77.2%. The reasonable dosage of coagulant and coagulant aid was according to the wastewater quality in the engineering operation. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Research on vibration isolation system in 220KV substation
   reactor (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Reactor; Finite element; NSYS; Vibration Isolation System; Noise
AB Substation noise issue is popular problem which people always focus on. In this paper, the modal and harmonic response analyses have been processed on the main equipment reactor of the 220KV substation by finite element software ANSYS. The main reason for its vibration is pointed out and the simulation results with the equipment close to the measured value. Based on it the new vibration isolation system was designed. Compared with the original device, vibration and noise reduction was found to achieve the purpose, this method is practical, accurate, reliable, and has engineering significance. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Two Modeling Methods for Estimating Tree Canopy Transpiration
   with Sap Flow Technique (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Canopy conductance; transpiration; sap flow; model; Platycladus
   orientalis
ID STAND-SCALE TRANSPIRATION; JARVIS-STEWART MODEL; STOMATAL CONDUCTANCE;
   SURFACE CONDUCTANCE; CITRUS ORCHARD; RAIN-FOREST
AB Meteorological measurements combined with sap flow techniques provided a low-cost option to study the rates of water uptake by individual trees response to environmental factors on a continuous basis. Modeled canopy conductance (g(c)) has often been used to predict transpiration (E-c) with the Penman-Monteith (P-M) model. However, a Jarvis-type model modified to direct estimate the Ec specifically rather than canopy conductance suggested an alternative method. For comparative purpose we parameterized both P-M and modified Jarvis-type model using a series of environmental control functions: vapor pressure deficit, solar radiation and air temperature. Both approaches provided good predictions of canopy transpiration and explained 85% and 89% of the variance respectively. These two modeling methods offer a reasonable estimation of water use in the determination of water balance for land water resources planning, vegetation management and impact assessments of rehabilitation. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: A study of the urban wetland water quality heterogeneity at
   differing scales (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE urban wetlands; multi-scales; water quality; Nanjing City
ID NUTRIENT CONCENTRATIONS; URBANIZATION; IMPACTS; FOREST
AB 15 urban wetlands in Nanjing City were collected to be studied for their vegetation and water quality monthly from March 2008 to February 2009. Further more, the variation of the water quality among 15 urban wetlands was revealed at two scales, i.e, urban wetland ecosystem scale and the catchment scale. Results showed that, (1) the wetland styles including protosomatic wetlands (PWs), secondary wetlands (SWs) and reconstructive wetlands (RWs), together with plant coverage density impacted the water quality obviously at the ecosystem scale. Water qualities in PWs were better than those in SWs and RWs, and the more plant coverage, the better the water quality was. (2) Land use types and impervious areas were the important factors influenced on the water quality at the catchment scale. Resident land and other construct land made the water quality bad at the catchment scale. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Inhibition of Algae Growth in Landscape Water Using
   Tetrasilver Tetroxide-Coated Pebbles (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Tetrasilver tetroxide; Algae-inhibiting effect; Landscape water; Silver
   oxide
AB The antibacterial property of silver has long been known and used in various applications due to its high toxicity to bacteria and low toxicity to humans. Excessive algae growth has been a common problem for landscape water in many urban areas in China. In this study, silver oxide in the form of tetrasilver tetroxide coated on pebbles was used to investigate its effect on inhibiting algae growth. Experiment results showed that a rapid and long-lasting algae-inhibiting effect was produced by the tetrasilver tetroxide-coated pebbles, provided that the water depth was less than a certain value. The first-three-days algae removal rates all reached above 50%, and the 90-day algae removal rates stabilized above 90% for experiments with water depths of 0.4 and 0.7 m. No algae-inhibiting effect was found when the water depth was increased to 1 m. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [He, Chengda; Yang, Huan; Yu, Lintang; Wu, Jun] YangZhou Univ, Sch Environm Sci & Engn, Yangzhou 225000, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: Combined homotopy method for a class of nonconvex
   multi-objective optimization problems (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE multi-objective programming; homotopy method; global convergence
AB This paper, we discussed a class of nonconvex composite multi-objective optimization problems under the weaker assumption conditions. We construct a new homotopy continuation mapping and obtain a smooth bounded homotopy path which converges globally to the K-K-T solution of multi-objective programming. A numerical example was provided to exhibit the effectiveness of this method. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: The Research on Affecting Factors of CO Concentration in
   Propellant Combustion Gas (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE propellant; CO; propellant combustion gas; gas chromatography; minimum
   free energy method
AB The affecting factors of CO concentration in propellant combustion gas have been researched and tested by the methods of theoretical calculation and experimental determination. Minimum free energy method was applied in theoretical calculation and the static test of closed bomb-gas chromatography was used in the later method. When the oxygen balance changed from -23.074% to +9.226%, the CO concentration reduced 41.5284%. The experimental results show that the CO concentration in combustion gas can reduce by improving the oxygen balance of propellant and there is a similar linear relationship between the CO concentration and the oxygen balance of propellant. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [He, Li-Ming; He, Zeng-Di] N Univ China, Sch Chem Engn & Environm, Taiyuan 030051, Shanxi, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: Optimal Capital Injections Barrier for the Compound Binomial
   Risk Model (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE compound binomial risk model; Bellman equation; optimal capital
   injection barrier
AB In this paper we discuss the optimal capital injections problem for the compound binomial risk model. T(a)he value function is defined by maximizing the discounted value of the dividend payment minus the penalized discounted capital injection until the time of ruin. It is shown that the value function can be characterized by the Bellman's equation. We find the optimal upper capital injection barrier and the optimal lower capital injection barrier. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Nitrate Removal from Groundwater Using Maifan Stone and
   Activated Carbon as Biofilm Carrier (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE maifan stone; activated carbon; nitrate removal; C/N ratio
ID DENITRIFICATION; ANDESITE; REACTOR; WATER
AB The aim of this paper is to evaluate nitrate removal performance using various proportion of maifan stone (MFS) and activated carbon (AC) as bioflim carrier under different C/N ratios. Four columns filled with mixed maifan stone and activated carbon in different proportion (1/0, 2/1, 1/1, 1/2) were used as denitrification reactors in an up-flow mode. NO3--N, NO2--N, NH3-N, and pH were tested at hydraulic retention time (HRT) of 16h. The indication show that nitrate removal efficiency reaches above 99.5% for all the columns at the C/N ratio of 1 and 2(methanol as carbon source). When the C/N ratio is kept at 0.9 and 0.8, the nitrate removal efficiency of column1 is about 90%, a little lower than other three columns, however, the nitrite accumulation and ammonia production for column 1 is the least of the four columns. The results proved that no extra phosphorous and trace elements are needed due to the leaching performance of MFS. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [Hong, Siqi; Feng, Chuanping; Zhang, Jianmei] China Univ Geosci, Sch Water Resource & Environm, Beijing, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: Treatment of Expressway Service Area Wastewater with Step
   Feeding A/O Biological Contact Oxidation Process (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE high-strength COD and TKN; expressway service area wastewater; step
   feeding; A/O biological contact oxidation process; biological nitrogen
   removal
AB Based on the 24-hour monitoring results of quality and quantity of wastewater discharged from the expressway service area, a three-step feeding A/O biological contact oxidation process was employed to treat the expressway service area wastewater which was of high-strength COD and total Kjeldahl nitrogen (TKN). By two stages continuous experiment, the treatment effect of the process to the high-strength COD and TKN wastewater was studied. The experiment results indicated, when the three-step feeding A/O biological contact oxidation process employed to treat the high-strength COD and TKN wastewater, alkalinity was a decisive factor for the treatment effect of the process. When COD, TKN, ammonia nitrogen and total nitrogen (TN) concentrations of the influent were 1030mg/L, 212mg/L, 153mg/L and 213mg/L respectively, and HRT was 36 hours, the removal efficiencies of the process to COD, TKN, ammonia nitrogen and total nitrogen were higher than 95%, 98%, 98% and 80% respectively. The effluent quality was superior to the first discharge standard of integrated wastewater discharge standard (GB8978-1996). (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: A GIS-based Building Platform for Developing E-government
   System (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE GIS; Building platform; E-government; SOA
AB E-government system can contribute to the work efficiency of public service and deal the governmental transactions conveniently by decision makers. However, numerous systems haven't integrated GIS functionality and information, which can extend the value of application systems by increasing accuracy, visuality, and productivity. In addition, the systems are difficult to rapid response against the changes of business requirements, and the program is hard to develop. This paper discusses the building and configuration technology, plugin technology for integration development by taking advantage of the enabling technologies of SOA and GIS. Within the model, the architecture of building platform that integrated GIS workflow system, visual form designer, and operation platform is described. The goal of the proposed design is to provide loosely coupled architecture to improve flexibility and reduce complexity of development, in particular, WebGIS function can be developed quickly, achieving the diverse GIS business establishment. Finally, the feasibility of using building platform to build e-government is showed in land and resources department of Hunan province. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

DE RTG; Overhead Slide Wire; Cable
AB "Overhead Slide Wire Program" of RTG oil to electricity scheme adopts overhead slider to supply power for container tire crane. The diesel generator is replaced by electric motor to achieve the goals of saving cost, reduce pollution and noise as well as protection of environment. As much higher process requirements and subject to limitation of site condition, this method proposes much higher requirements to structural design. TI RETRACTED: Pilot Study of Biological-Ecological Filter (BEF) for
   Municipal Wastewater Treatment (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Biological-Ecological Filter; Microbe Earthworm Eco-Filter
AB Pilot-scale anaerobic hydrolysis reactor-high load biological filter - Microbe Earthworm Ecology Filter combined process was set-up for the treatment of domestic wastewater. Results showed that COD and ammonia nitrogen of the effluent water after treated were 15 similar to 50 mg/L, and 1 similar to 3mg/L respectively, in the operating condition of residence time of pool acid hydrolysis (5h) and hydraulic loading of high-capacity biological filter (15m(3)/m(2).d), and hydraulic loading of Microbe Earthworm Eco-Filter (7.0m(3)/m(2).d), when the COD and ammonia nitrogen of the influent water were 280 similar to 450 mg/L and 25 similar to 35 mg/L, respectively. Water quality of the effluent water could meet the first requirement of Chinese Discharge Standard of Pollutants for Municipal Wastewater Treatment Plant (GB 18918-2002). A large number of protozoa and metazoan were found in the microscopic examination of biofilm, implying operational stabilization of biofilter and large degradation of organic matter. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Application of Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) to the
   Structural Safety Evaluation of Stone Arch Bridge in Service for over 10
   Years (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Stone Arch Bridge; Fuzzy Synthetic Evaluation; Hierarchical Structure
   Model; Safety Evaluationy
AB A survey on the dangerous bridge along the mountain road in south-west China revealed that various degrees of damages had occurred to the stone arch bridges that had been in service for over 10 years. As these damages would affect their safety, it became the focus and the difficult part of the current research to evaluate the safety performance indicators of those stone arch bridges. With the application of multi-hierarchical fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method, the relative weight of factors in each hierarchy was determined considering various factors affecting the bridges' bearing capacity; then the ratio of the structural resistance value to the external load of the bridges in active service was obtained; and finally the bridges' safety performance evaluation indicators were determined. The advantage of this evaluating system in actual project lay in its clear distinction between the important factors and the lesser ones, simplification of evaluation work and good evaluating effect. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Evaluating Indexes of Risk Level in Construction Project by
   Fuzzy Matter-element Model (Retracted Article)

   2011
SE Energy Procedia

DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication

CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Fuzzy matter-element model; Construction project; Risk level
AB As a tool, Comprehensive Evaluation based on fuzzy matter-element model provides a way to calculate risks. This paper introduces the common theory of fuzzy matter-element model evaluation, puts up general procedures of risk evaluation based on fuzzy matter-element model evaluation, and establishes model of fuzzy matter-element model risk evaluation as well as comprehensive evaluation method based on fuzzy matter-element model. This paper, through a real project, analyses risks exist in the project of Caiyuanba Bridge in Chongqing from the view of proprietor with fuzzy matter-element model evaluation applied, and the results verifies the superiority and feasibility of the method and its good efficiency in project risk management. TI RETRACTED: Optimized Method for Extracting Bridge Flutter Derivative
   Identification Based on Ibrahim-Domain Method (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Free vibration Method; Flutter derivative; Ptimized
ID FORCE FUNCTIONS
AB The experimental amount for solving flutter derivative of bridge by free vibration method brought up by R.H. Scanlan is very large, and in process of extracting cross derivative it is difficult to achieve that frequency ratio and damping ratio of vertical motion and torsional motion of model is the same in all wind speed. Besides, the identification error of uncoupled derivative will be in coupled derivative. The paper presents an improved method based on Ibrahim time domain. Extracting all flutter derivatives of bridge deck with optimizing algorithm of DFP is better in solving the nonlinear parameter identification than the least squares method. TI RETRACTED: Study on Mountain Wind Environment and Buffeting Response of
   Large Steel Truss Arch Bridge (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Western region of China; Wind environment; Large-span arch bridge;
   Buffeting force; Buffeting response
AB At present, the wind resistant studies for the bridge are mainly aimed at the open plain areas, but the wind resistant studies, functioned by the complex wind at the western mountain, are seldom made. Thus, taking the Chongqing Daning River Bridge for the object in this paper, the environmental characteristics of the wind at the Daning River Bridge are obtained firstly through field measurement, including basic wind speed, wind profile, turbulence intensity, fluctuating wind power spectral density function as well as turbulence integral scale and other parameters. Then, through the numerical analysis, the buffeting forces and the response values on the full bridge are calculated. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Mining OO Framework hot-spot Instantiation Pattern based on
   MSE Tree (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Object-Oriented; framework; instantiation Pattern; Maximum Sharing Edge
   Sub_Tree
AB Object-oriented Framework (OOF) enable reuse at both code level and design level by capturing the commonalities of an application domain into a set of carefully designed abstract classes with well-defined collaborations. It is very difficult to use OOF because the sizes of the framework are often large and many of the existing frameworks suffer from the lack of proper manuals and documentation. In this paper, the concept of Maximum Sharing sub-Edge Tree (MSET) is proposed. Based on the MSET, we propose an algorithm for mining the framework hot-spot instantiation pattern. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Research of Dynamic Parameter Identification of LuGre Model
   Based on Weights Boundary Neural Network (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE neural networks; weight boundary; LuGre model; dynamic parameters
   identification
AB The identification problem on the dynamic parameters in LuGre model is studied. The identification method proposed uses a neural network which considers weights boundary. The network structures and weight adjustment algorithm are given out. In order to find a set of parameters to make it approach the actual one, this algorithm uses neural network identification within the bounds of the identified parameters. Compared with the non-linear least squares (NLS) parameter identification, the relative errors of parameters which are identified by neural network based on weights boundary (WBNN) are smaller, and the precision is higher. Numerical simulation is provided to show the efficiency of the proposed method. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Multi-function Landmark Design and Application for Robot
   Self-localization Based on Single Landmark (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011

DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE landmark design; localization algorithm; fisheye; single landmark
AB To save time, improve flexibility and guarantee accuracy of the navigation system of the mobile robots, a multi-function landmark and a new navigation algorithm are proposed in this paper. With the new algorithm and landmark the mobile robots can be located by only a single landmark, and can be navigated in a large area by serial landmarks. The simple configuration and the convenient material of the landmark increased the system's flexibility and decreased the complexity of the algorithm. From the experimental results it can be concluded that the navigation system has fast navigation speed and high navigation accuracy (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: Web Information Retrieval based on Ontology (Retracted
   Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Ontology; Semantic web; Information Retriveal
AB The purpose of the Information Retrieval (IR) is to find a set of documents that are relevant for a specific information need of a user. Traditional Information Retrieval model commonly used in commercial search engine is based on keyword indexing system and Boolean logic queries. One big drawback of traditional information retrieval is that they typically retrieve information without an explicitly defined domain of interest to the users so that a lot of no relevance information returns to users, which burden the user to pick up useful answer from these no relevance results. In order to tackle this issue, many semantic web information retrieval models have been proposed recently. The main advantage of Semantic Web is to enhance search mechanisms with the use of Ontology's mechanisms. In this paper, we present our approach to personalize web search engine based on ontology. In addition, key techniques are also discussed in our paper. Compared to previous research, our works concentrate on the semantic similarity and the whole process including query submission and information annotation. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 Suzhou Univ, Coll Informat Engn, Suzhou 23400, Anhui, Peoples R China.
RP Jian, Z (reprint author), Suzhou Univ, Coll Informat Engn, Suzhou 23400, Anhui, Peoples R China.
EM mudan2300@126.com

DE fuel cell; lawn mower; design; CAD
AB The power source of traditional lawn mower is internal combustion engine, it results in noise pollution, leads to an emission problem, and increases the pressure of energy. Fuel cell lawn mower replaces two-stroke or four-stroke gasoline engine of the traditional lawn mower with a fuel cell engine. It has the advantage of energy economy, environmental protection and low noise. Developing the new fuel cell agricultural and forestry machinery have much advantage such as low noise, environmental protection. It is important for the sustainable development. TI RETRACTED: Finite Element Analysis of a Bus Skeleton and Structure
   Improvement (Retracted Article)

   2011

DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication

CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE bus structure; FEA; Optimizing; static strength; structure improvement
AB Using Finite Element Analysis (FEA) to analyze structure of a bus is a main step of the body design. It can optimize the mechanical structure. A bus sample was researched. Its three-dimensional geometric model was built with CATIA. And a finite element model is setup with basic element of CQUAD4 for future strength analysis in Nastran. When building FEA model, it is essential to consider some factors such as simplification of geometric model, boundary conditions, weight and load. And five working conditions were analyzed. Finally, regional structure with high strength was improved and some improving methods were given based on the the result of simulation. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: Multi-sensor Image Automatic Registration Using Mutual
   Information (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Multi-sensor Images; Mutual Information; Image Registration; Affine
   Transform
AB A novel multi-sensor image registration algorithm was introduced, which was based on wavelet transform and the maximization of mutual information. Firstly, the region of interest was determined by search of wavelet magnitude maxima in the preprocessing step of images, and the affine transform was chosen as the image transform model. Secondly, the probability distribution of grey value was estimated by interpolation of pixel values to calculate image intensity histogram. Finally, the simulated annealing algorithm was used to approximate the global optimum. The experiment data show that the algorithm was effective and feasible. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Local gabor characteristic integrated with LDP for face
   recognition with one training sample (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE face recognition; local gabor phase characteristic; characteristic
   fusion; locality dispersing projection
AB Traditional methods get low recognition accuracy in the condition of only one training sample. A new face recognition method based on local Gabor phase characteristic and locality dispersing projection (LGP/LDP) is proposed. In our proposed method, according to the good spatial position and orientation of Gabor filter, a Gabor filter with four frequencies and six orientations is firstly applied to filter face images. Based on Daugman's method and the local Exclusive- or (XOR) pattern, local Gabor patterns are then extracted to form the characteristic images. Finally, LDP is used to project the characteristic images of each spatial position and orientation into low dimensional space. Neighbor classifier is adopted and the classified information is fused to get the recognition result. Experimental results show that our method consistently outperforms other recognition method based on Principal Component Analysis (PCA), LDP and local Gabor phase characteristic integrated with PCA (LGP/PCA). (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: The Effect of Humic Acid on Ultrafiltration Membrane Fouling
   (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE humid acid; ultrafiltration; membrane fouling
ID DRINKING-WATER; FLUX RECOVERY; REMOVAL; MODEL
AB To investigate the fouling phenomena of ultrafiltration membrane caused by humic acid solution, four important parameters such as time, pressure, pH value and calcium ion concentration were considered in the experiment. The changes of various membrane fouling resistances and humic acid retention rates were also analyzed. Moreover, the surface and cross section of the clean and fouled ultrafiltration membranes was observed by emission scanning electron microscope. The results show that a rapid fouling takes place due to internal pore adsorption, pore blocking and a fouling gel developed on the membranes. Concentration polarization plays a main role in initial period. The pH value as the important parameter decided what kind of fouling playing the main role. As pH value ranges between 6 and 9, the membrane fouling is relatively light. Both acid and alkali can aggravate humic acid fouling: acid promotes the formation of the gel layer, while alkali accelerates the blockage of membrane hole. The existence of calcium ion will aggravate the fouling of ultrafiltration membrane and reduce the rejection rate of humic acid. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [Jiao Na; Zhang Yonggang] Tianjin Polytech Univ, Sch Environm & Chem Engn, Tianjin 300384, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: Local autonomous capture strategy for a space snare interface
   (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE snare interface; capture strategy; end effector; on-orbit capture
AB Because of the joints flexibility and the distortion of long tubular booms, high precision tracking and positioning performance of large space manipulator can hardly be achieved. As a result, during space capture process, big position error and escaping velocity between the end effector and the target object would exist even when the manipulator is pre-located. To solve this problem, a typical kind of flexible interface fit for space capture application is introduced to improve the capture ability of the end effector. Moreover, a visual based equivalent capture strategy is put forward to avoid the complicate modeling problem of the unknown correcting force that acts on the grapple of the target during capture process. The proposed strategy makes the complicate capture problem to be a simple position tracking problem. Meanwhile, a sliding mode controller based on the fuzzy switching gain is designed to suppress the disturbance by unknown extern force. Experiments show that the proposed strategy can improve the autonomous capture ability of the large end effector. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Domino: A Lattice Shaped Concurrent Sequential Control System
   (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Domino; Sequential Control; Programmed Control; Remote Control; SCADA
ID TOOL
AB To enhance the concurrency of the traditional sequential/program control systems, which adopt naive linear sequential ways of control step transition, the Domino sequential control system supports the simultaneous triggering of multiple control sequences and steps. Moreover, as the solution for the control flow continuation when a step failure is encountered, a two-way conditional transition mechanism is implemented through performing control steps bypathing. With the cooperation of the script engine embedded and a GUI configurator, Domino empowers users to customize control sequences to service all sorts of complicated control requirements proposed in the engineering of industrial automation systems. Moreover, to meet with the security demand enforced by mission critical applications, a two-layer precondition validation procedure is dedicated for the recognizing and prevention of user operation faults. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: The Selection of Natural Solid-phase Slow-release Organic
   Carbon-source Materials for the Denitrification Permeable Reactive
   Barriers (PRB) (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE groundwater; nitrate; PRB; lignite; walnut shells
ID COAL
AB Nitrate pollution in groundwater is a serious hazard to people's health. Permeable reactive barriers (PRB) have become the core technology used to remediate nitrate pollution in groundwater. Seven different materials of normal compressive strength, viz. Shandong Longkou lignite, Inner Mongolia Pingzhuang lignite, Heilongjiang Sanjitun lignite, Yunnan Zhaotong lignite, anthracite, coke, and walnut shells were selected for denitrification-PRB media testing. Experimental results indicate that walnut shells had the highest nitrate removal efficiency, 80%, and their effluent concentration of NO3-N was under 3mg.L-1. Shandong Longkou lignite, Inner Mongolia Pingzhuang lignite, and Heilongjiang Sanjitun lignite also had the capability to release organic carbon-source slowly, and were able to be utilized effectively by the denitrifying bacteria. They could be used as the denitrification-PRB media. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Chaos Immune Optimization Algorithm in Distribution Service
   Restoration after Faults (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Distribution service restoration; Immune algorithm; Chaos optimization;
   Switch combination
AB Chaos immune optimization algorithm on distribution service restoration after faults is presented to improve the probability for optimal solution in this paper, which is integrated the characteristic of chaotic optimization with artificial immunity algorithm. In the proposed algorithm, excellent global search ability of chaotic optimization is regarded as "thick search" to initialize the antibody of immune algorithm, and local search of artificial immune algorithm is applied to replace "thin search" in the chaotic optimization, which assures the population diversity and avoids getting to stuck in local minima to a certain degree. A living example for a certain district distribution in Chongqing is analyzed by the method presented in this paper. The result shows that chaos immune optimization algorithm in the paper might improve convergence speed and precision of restoration and avoid premature convergence. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: BP Algorithm of ANN Applied in Temperature Control Tests with
   MATLAB (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE ANN; BP algorithm; temperature control
AB This paper predicts the temperature of optical transmitter and receiver through the BP algorithm based on MATLAB simulation platform. The inner temperature is affected by ambient temperature, heating power, air pressure, wrapping mode, whose stabilization needs corresponding adjustment of these conditions. And the BP network structure with 4-8-5-1 is adopted, the Tansig function is applied in the implication layer, at the same time, the Purelin function is applied in the output layer. At last, the finite samples are trained and tested through the MATLAB. Contrast with the PID algorithm, the simulation result shows that there is a higher precision and faster convergence in the BP algorithm. In the meantime, the generalization ability of the BP network gives inner temperature when there are 4 inputs, which reflects the basic feature of the whole system. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Research on the QoS Control Technology in Overlay Network
   Based on Distribution Application (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE QoS Control; route technology; overlay network; distribution application
AB In recent years, most distributed multimedia applications are deployed directly on the Internet, and to carry real-time streaming services on the Internet is still very serious challenges. Internet is constructed on the basis of TCP/IP protocol, which provides the only best effort service, and adopts the best strategy of meet competition for all the service requests. This method lacks efficient resource scheduling classification, which leads to a variety of network resource sharing prone to bottlenecks and reduce the network throughput. Therefore, a good way to guarantee quality of service on multimedia application should be established based on the existing Internet architecture. In this paper, firstly, the low load balancing QoS routing technology is proposed with the application requirements of distributed multimedia services in overlay network. Characterization of the path through the establishment on the profit and loss model of resource consumption, resource consumption will be bound into the path of incremental choices. Secondly, the fast QoS re-routing technology is studied, and the introduction of reconstruction costs model, as constrained alternative routing process. Theoretical analysis shows that the method can effectively improve the efficiency of route recovery time and reduce the recovery delay. Finally, a dynamic QoS-aware approach to changes in demand is established. The training samples by the principle of self-learning assessment model to establish a unified system of shielding parameters of the difference between the ability to adapt to different QoS parameters for monitoring. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Application of Numerical Simulation Method Based on
   Multi-physics Coupling Technique in the Dust Contril (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Numerical Simulation; Multi-physics; Surge Bunker; Dust Control
AB Surge bunker is one of the part with the worst dust pollution in ATP process. Aiming at the technological features of dust pollution of ATP surge bunker, the dust made machinism and movement of dust were analyzed, and a numerical model of dust movement was established, and the model was simulating analyzed with multi-physics coupling numerical simulation software COMSOL Multiphysic. Through analysis of the inner flow field and pressure changes of the surge bunker before and after dust control, the movement and characteristics of the oil shale dust in the blocked and negative pressure surge bunker was obtained, and the dust control technology "combination of blocking- pressure relief" was raised. The application of multi-physics coupling technology and computer simulation techniques in industrial ventilation and dust control has scientific significance both to the dust removal system design and production practices. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Characteristic of Granular Sludge Bed and Granular Sludge in
   Interior Diversion Expanded Granular Sludge Bed (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE interior diversion expanded granular sludge bed; COD removal efficiency;
   sludge bed expansion rate
ID BIOREACTOR; EFFLUENT
AB The interior diversion expanded granular sludge bed was concurrently operated for 140d to study the characteristic of the granular sludge bed. The influent COD concentration varied from 2000mg/L to 22300 mg/L, hydraulic retention time was maintained constant at 24 h and the organic loading rate was changed through a change in substrate concentration. The results showed that the reactor had great COD removal efficiency. When the MLSS was 23.1g/L, the influent COD was 18890mg/L, the COD removal efficiency was 80.4%; The interior diversion EGSB could greatly improve the role of gas-dynamic, when the liquid upflow velocity was 3.55m/h, the gas production was 5.96 L/d shows higher sludge bed expansion rate than 2.77 L/d about 9.5%. During the experimental, the anaerobic sludge has the following properties: the average sludge diameter was increased from 0.41mm to 1.66mm. Observed under the scanning electronic microscopy, we found that the sludge appeared obviously granulation, the bacteria amount and species are more than seed sludge after operation of 50d. It was found that rough surface of anaerobic sludge has clear figure with being covered by mucous lamina, with visible hole or cavity on surface. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Study Calculation Method on Infrared Special Facula View
   Based on Image Processing Technology (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Special facula; image processing technology; view angle; image
   preprocessing; edge detection
AB To verify the detection range of special facula size which is emitted by infrared sensor, the method that uses image processing technology to calculate was proposed. Space geometric measurement model was set up to calculate infrared sensor Special facula view, and analyze its measure principle. Standard grid screen was used to calculate and analyze special facula view size, according to the size of special facula view in standard grid screen and the space geometric relation of camera and grid, the special facula view can be calculate and display in the computer, this paper analyzes the principle of measuring special facula view, and researches its measure structure, and studies the disposing arithmetic of Special facula view by image processing, including image preprocessing, background and facula separation, and the edge detection. Using space physical geometric relation, special facula view angle can be gain. Through experiments, the technology of image processing is feasibility in special facula view calculating. TI RETRACTED: Research and Analysis Infrared Radiation Detection
   Performance of Projectile in Photoelectric Detection Target (Retracted
   Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE infrared radiation; photoelectric detection target; projectile; screen
AB Photoelectric detection target is an instrument that is used to measure the parameter of flying projectile in the out ballistics, and the method of visible light was used to design its detection system which has obvious merit during the day, but it cannot work at night. The technology of infrared detection was put forward to design the detection system of photoelectric detection target to solve the problem that it cannot work at night. The principle of detection and the characteristic of infrared radiation on flying projectile were analyzed; the temperature of every point on the projectile surface at each time was calculate, according to PLANK LOW IR, the calculation equation of temperature radiation and radiant intensity on flying projectile in detection screen were set up and analyzed; combine the characteristic of detection screen, the relation infrared radiation and output voltage in the different detection area were analyzed. Through experiment, it is proved that information of infrared when the projectile going through screen can be obtained, the response wavelengths is 3 similar to 5um. TI RETRACTED: Mining Top-K frequent closed itemset in data streams
   (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE data streams; closed frequent itemsets; top-K
AB Mining closed frequent itemsets from data streams is of interest recently. However, it is not easy for users to determine a proper minimum support threshold. Hence, it is more reasonable to ask users to set a bound on the result size. Therefore, a real-time single-pass algorithm, called Top-k-FCI and a new way of updating the minimum support were proposed for mining top-K closed itemsets from data streams efficiently. A novel algorithm, called can( T), is developed for mining the essential candidate of closed itemsets generated so far. Experimental results show that the proposed Top-k-FCI algorithm is an efficient method for mining top-K frequent itemsets from data streams. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

   Synthetic Evaluation Method (Retracted Article)

   2011

DE Environmental Education; Quality synthetic evaluation method;
   Investigation and analysis
AB Environmental problems become more and more serious under the quick development of economy. In order to make the whole society understand the worsening issues of the environment and correctly establish the environmental value, the government has been using environment education to promote the environmental protection knowledge, consolidate and improve the environmental consciousness. This paper is based on the questionnaire survey and analysis the results, using quality synthetic evaluation method to evaluate the status of environmental education in our country. TI RETRACTED: Image Denoising in Shearlet Domain Based on Shuffled Frog
   Leaping Algorithm (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Shuffled Frog Leaping Algorithm; Shearlet Transform; Image Denoising
AB Image denoising in shearlet domain based on shuffled frog leaping algorithm was proposed in this paper. Based on shuffled frog leaping algorithm combining of memetic algorithm with strong local search ability and particle swarm optimization with good global search ability, Using the proposed optimal threshold, the noisy image can be adaptively denoised based on image content. Simulation results indicate that the method can filter noise effectively and preserve edge information of image preferably. Meanwhile, the denoised images achieve higher PSNR. TI RETRACTED: Research and Implement of Remote Vehicle Monitoring and
   Early-warning System Based on GPS/GPRS (Retracted Article)

   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Transportation Engineering; Remote Monitoring; Early-warning; Road Test
AB Concerning the problem of road traffic safety, remote monitoring and early-warning of vehicle states was the key to prevent road traffic accidents and improve the transportation effectiveness. Through the embedded development technology, a remote vehicle monitoring and early-warning system was developed based on UNO2170 industrial computer of Advantech with WinCE operating system using Embedded Visual C++ (EVC), which combined with multi-sensor data acquisition technology, global positioning system (GPS) and general packet radio service (GPRS). It achieved the remote monitoring and early-warning of commercial vehicle. This system was installed in a CA1046L2 light truck. Through many road tests, test results showed that the system reacted rapidly for abnormal vehicle states and had stable performance. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd.    Receiver Quality Inspection System (Retracted Article)

CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE words-automatic; mass; GPS receiver; inspection; language C#
AB This paper proposed a software solution of GPS receiver quality inspection system based on the Simulated Signal Source. The GPS receiver quality inspection software of friendly man-machine interface, high efficiency and good stability is developed using language C#. Firstly, the functions of system are analyzed by the objective-oriented means. And the block diagram of whole software structure is given. Then the main function, data flow diagram, design effect and testing process of the Mathematical and Simulation Subsystem, Management and Control Subsystem and Testing and Evaluation Subsystem are detailed introduced. At last the quality inspection report on the Novatel dual-frequency receiver proved that the GPS receiver quality inspection software system is of good openness and high transplant ability. TI RETRACTED: Evaluating Multiple Heavy Metal Pollutants in Soil by
   Artificial Neural Network: A Case Study in Baotou, China (Retracted
   Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Heavy metal pollutants; Soil quality assessment; Artificial neural
   networks
AB Assessment of heavy metal risk and spatial distribution for special area are fundamental to the study of soil environmental quality. The paper provides a case of artificial neural network using for the soil quality assessment, which does focus on eight heavy metal pollutants, Hg, Cd, Pb, Cr, As, Zn, Cu and Ni. Firstly, the paper introduces the Back Propagation Neural Network theory using in the soil evaluation of heavy metals pollutants. Secondly, the authors designed the model with 8 input parameters. Thirdly, the model was simulated and experiments were done extensively using MATLAB neural network toolbox. In the study area City Baotou and its suburbs, we totally collected 220 soil samples from measuring points. From the GIS analysis, we find that the pollution is mainly caused by human industrial activities. And the enrichment of heavy metals in topsoil is very obvious in industrial areas and regions near both sides of the Kundulun River. It is concluded that the model of BP neural network is a practical and simple method for the soil quality assessment. The model can take advantages of simple network structure, fast convergence rate and well generality for soil heavy metal pollution evaluation. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [Li, Xiang; Zhang, Xiaoyu] Zhengzhou Inst Aeronaut Ind Management, Zhengzhou 450015, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: Improved Soil Heavy Metal Pollution Evaluating System Using
   MAS and GIS (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Heavy Metal Pollution; Multi-agent System; Geographic Information System
AB Soil is the basic natural resources, and its quality is closely related to the area topographical spatial morphology and various kinds of pollutants migration. It is heavy metal pollution that affects the normal function of the soil, resulting in the pollution of the food chain, and being great threat to humans and ecological environments. So it is important to establish the visual software platform for soil quality evaluation, in which the researchers can carry out the soil heavy metal pollution spatial analysis and qualitative assessment. It is reasonable that the software system was established using Geographic Information System (GIS) and Multi-agent System (MAS).
   The author focused on the method and key technology of the application of GIS and MAS technology used in the evaluation of soil heavy metal pollution. And in this paper, functions of every agent and cooperative relationships among agents in the system were deeply concerned. The system not only provides an integrated software platform to evaluate the heavy metal pollution and analyze the ecological disaster but also has the ability to soil quality forecast warning. To point out that the establishment of MAS-based safety warning of soil heavy metal pollution are extremely needed to the soil environmental development. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: Framework of Evaluating Ecosystem Loss Caused by Accidents
   (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE ecosystem service; destroy of ecosystem; loss evaluating; evaluating
   framework
ID SERVICES
AB The article is to construct a framework of evaluating the loss of destroyed ecosystem. First, based on published studies, the article sums up the ecosystem services as 9 kinds: supply, gas regulation, etc., the evaluation methods for each kind of services are also summarized. Then the procedure of evaluating the loss of destroyed ecosystem is put forward. After that the article focuses on four major ecosystems, forests, wetlands, grassland and farmland, analyzes their possible ecological service damages caused by accidents, and the alternative method of evaluating the loss.
